channel.title: Season 2 Ro, Sham, Bo
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Season 2 Ro, Sham, Bo" - Can't get their special missions to lvl them for 3 lvl 2 allies to complete special jonin mission, do I need to be special jonin for their missions?

item.title: Re: Season 2 Ro, Sham, Bo
item.content:encoded: You need to be a special jonin for their missions. The Lvl 2's that work for the Sp. Jonin exam are Meatballs, Red Rover, Spot, Terri, Yuri, Bruce Jr., and Emosuke.

item.title: Season 2 Ro, Sham, Bo
item.content:encoded: Can't get their special missions to lvl them for 3 lvl 2 allies to complete special jonin mission, do I need to be special jonin for their missions?
